name: piglet
description: Piglet is a self-hosted service for creating and managing digital flashcards and quizzes. It includes spaced repetition, deck management, and a study UI built for personal or educational use.
features: Flashcard creation: Create digital flashcards with questions, answers, and optional images.
Spaced repetition: Automatically schedule card reviews using spaced repetition algorithms for optimal retention.
Deck management: Organize flashcards into decks by subject, topic, or difficulty level.
Study sessions: Practice with timed study sessions that adapt to your learning progress.
Progress tracking: Monitor learning statistics including accuracy rates and review frequency.
Quiz mode: Test knowledge with quiz-style sessions that randomize card order.
Multi-user support: Create separate accounts for different learners with individual progress tracking.
Import and export: Transfer flashcard decks using standard formats for sharing or backup.
Markdown support: Format card content with Markdown for rich text and code snippets.
Mobile responsive: Study on any device with a responsive interface optimized for phones and tablets.
Custom scheduling: Adjust spaced repetition intervals to match your learning preferences.
Performance analytics: View detailed statistics on learning progress and retention rates.
